title: Negative features of sporadic amyotrophic lateral sclerosis: Motor neurons of Onuf's nucleus survive in ADAR2-conditional knockout mice
details: T Hideyama, S Teramoto, H Kato, H Terashi, S Kwak… - Journal of the Neurological …, 2024
abstract: Patients with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) do not develop oculomotor disturbances and vesicorectal dysfunction until end-stage disease owing to the survival of certain motor neurons (MNs), including oculomotor neurons and MNs …
